member.name: P:KoiSkinOverlayX.KoiSkinOverlayController.AdditionalTextures
member.summary: Additional overlays to be applied over the KSOX overlay (if any). Drawn bottom to top based on index. Use UpdateTexture to refresh.

member.name: T:KoiSkinOverlayX.TexType
member.summary: Names are important, don't change! - used for filenames and extended data keys

member.name: T:KoiSkinOverlayX.AdditionalTexture
member.summary: An overlay texture that can be added to the overlay stack. Add to after each character reload. Make sure to check if your texture doesn't already exist before adding!

member.name: M:KoiSkinOverlayX.AdditionalTexture.#ctor(UnityEngine.Texture2D,KoiSkinOverlayX.TexType,System.Object)
member.summary: Create a new additional overlay texture.
member.param: What part to apply the overlay to

member.name: M:KoiSkinOverlayX.AdditionalTexture.#ctor(UnityEngine.Texture2D,KoiSkinOverlayX.TexType,System.Object,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new additional overlay texture.
member.param: What part to apply the overlay to
Order in which the overlay isapplied relative to other additional overlay textures. Lower number is applied earlier. Default is 0.

member.name: M:KoiSkinOverlayX.Util.OpenFileInExplorer(System.String)
member.summary: Open explorer focused on the specified file or directory

member.name: M:KoiSkinOverlayX.Util.NativeMethods.OpenFolderAndSelectFile(System.String)
member.summary: Open explorer focused on item. Reuses already opened explorer windows unlike Process.Start
